page.title: 19Life Styles-Graffitti.
page.content: Parts of the block are 'plagued' by the writing of names and symbols onto walls, usually the work of youngsters. Such graffitti takes two main forms. The first involves writing the name of a group or individual one favours: "Everton FC". In many cases initial letters are written: "LFC", meaning Liverpool Football Club. Individuals leave their mark by writing their name or nick name (often a corruption of their Christian name) and the current year underneath: "DICK" =85= would be produced by Richard in 1985. Couples publicise their feelings for each other by a combination such as this: DEBBIE + RONNIE The usual medium for these messages is the felt tipped pen. Those which use
